parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Size of the output array (see Remarks )

title: ICosmeticThreadFeatureData.IGetPatternedTransforms
description: Gets the transforms from this cosmetic thread for all of the instances of this cosmetic thread that are patterns of this feature.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Size of the output array (see Remarks )

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of interface pointers to the IMathTransform objects of the instances of this cosmetic thread VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ICosmeticThreadFeatureData::GetPatternedTransformsCount
before calling this method to determine the size of the output array.
The value returned by this method does not include this cosmetic thread, which is the seed feature and not a pattern instance. Therefore, if this cosmetic thread is not used in a pattern feature, then ICosmeticThreadFeatureData::GetPatternedTransformsCount returns 0 and nothing is put into the output array.
